post:
StrongNode - Affordable OpenVZ VPS Hosting

FLAT 50% RECURRING DISCOUNT - CODE SN50

================================================

Migrating from your current host? Looking for a better deal? Tired of downtime on existing host? Just want to try something new?

If you're migrating from another host, send us an email today! Get 90% off your first month if you qualify*. 8GB RAM for first month @ just $5.20; $25.98/month recurring thereafter. No obligations to stick around after your first month if you don't like the service.

* First month discount offer is applicable if you're moving from an existing provider. As such, we'll need to see your most recent, paid invoice with them if you wish to qualify. Beyond this requirement, there is no other 'catch'.

================================================​
At StrongNode, we like to keep things simple and straightforward. We only use brand name hardware and top quality configurations. Despite our unbelievable pricing, we do NOT oversell our nodes. You get exactly the specs you pay for, never less. Host with confidence!

We may be fairly new, but we have experience as both providers and customers in this industry for many years now. We know what it takes to make or break a web host and we won't be making the same mistakes your previous host has. Feel free to contact us for pre-sales queries.

Our nodes are currently hosted in Los Angeles, WebNX (4GB and 6GB configs) & Dallas, Incero (8GB configs).

================================================

Typical Host Node Config/Setup:

We don't believe in overselling our OpenVZ plans, so we only use top notch setups.
 

  • Dual Quad Core CPUs (E5* and X5*)
  • 128GB RAM minimum, up to 192GB and 256GB RAM
  • Hardware RAID-10 Protected Storage
  • Connectivity ranging from 100Mbit to 4GBit
  • No more than 30 VMs on a host node. Never.
Please note: Host nodes with a 100MBit uplink are gradually being upgraded to 1GBit, at minimum. Shortly, all our nodes will be connected at 1Gbit minimum, upto 4GBit on certain nodes. This connectivity is shared on a fair use basis with all hosted VPS's.

================================================

Features

You've already read about our monster configs. We also include the following features on every VPS:

 

  • Instant Activation on payment*
  • SolusVM Control Panel to manage your VPS
  • Diverse choice between available OS for your VPS
  • 99.9% Network Uptime Guarantee
  • Awesome network
  • Self managed
  • Custom OS on request
*Setup is instant on payment, however all orders are manually reviewed and we reserve the right to request for additional verification on certain orders deemed to be risky, failing which we reserve the right to suspend the VPS until requested verification is completed.

================================================

OpenVZ Plans

Skipping the yada yada, we offer 3 basic plans at the moment with varying configurations possible in the future. We do custom configurations; configs with specs lower than our most basic plan (SN4GB) are not possible at the moment.

SN-4GB:

  • RAM: 4GB
  • vSwap: 512MB
  • HDD Space: 60GB RAID-10 Protected Storage
  • Bandwidth: 1000GB/100MBit
  • IPv4: 1 Address
  • TUN/TAP: Enabled
  • OS: CentOS 5, 64-Bit Default, more available within SolusVM
  • Location: Los Angeles
Price: $31.95/mo $15.98/mo - 50% Off Recurring!
Click To Order

  • RAM: 6GB
  • vSwap: 512MB
  • HDD Space: 120GB RAID-10 Protected Storage
  • Bandwidth: 1000GB/100MBit
  • IPv4: 1 Address
  • TUN/TAP: Enabled
  • OS: CentOS 5, 64-Bit Default, more available within SolusVM

Price: $41.95/mo $20.98/mo - 50% Off Recurring!
Click To Order

  • RAM: 8GB
  • vSwap: 512MB
  • HDD Space: 120GB RAID-10 Protected Storage
  • Bandwidth: 3000GB/4000MBit (Yes, 4GBit!)
  • IPv4: 1 Address (More available, justification required, $1/address)
  • TUN/TAP: Enabled
  • OS: CentOS 5, 64-Bit Default, more available within SolusVM
  • Location: Dallas
Price: $51.95/mo $25.98/mo - 50% Off Recurring!
Click To Order

================================================

Quick FAQ:

What is the VPS setup time?
Your VPS will be setup instantly after payment. All orders are manually reviewed, however, and we reserve the right to request for additional verification on orders we deem to be risky to a certain degree. On these orders, we also reserve the right to suspend the provisioned VPS should the client not provide the requested verification until such a time as the verification is complete.

What payment methods do you accept?
At the moment we accept Paypal. You can also pay via credit cards using Paypal. We intend on adding support for additional digital currencies/wallets and Bitcoin in the near future.

What kind of support do you provide?
You should understand that the service you're purchasing from us is a self-managed service. These VPS servers are not managed by us; it is your responsibility to manage them and we make it convenient for you by including access to SolusVM for most common tasks (reboot, shutdown, OS reload, etc). As such, for the price we charge, we are only able to provide support on network and hardware related issues that impact the actual functioning of your VPS. Support requests other than that are currently not entertained. If you need help managing your VPS, we recommend signing up with a professional management company.

Do you provide a control panel for my VPS?
A control panel is not included in the discounted pricing. However, we can include a control panel along with managed service should you decide to purchase at the list prices (prices mentioned on the website). Contact us for further details.

Do you take backups of my VPS?
We do not currently have an automated backup procedure. We advise all our clients to maintain regular backups. In the event of a data loss, we cannot be held responsible.

Do you have a list of operating systems I can install on my VPS?
All virtual servers are deployed with a default installation of CentOS 5, 64-Bit. You can, however, choose from a wide variety of other operating systems from within the SolusVM management panel. If you would like to install an OS that is currently not available on our provided list, please contact us and we'll add it if possible.

Do you have an affiliate program?

We don't have a public affiliate offering, yet. However, we're doing private affiliate promotions if you want to refer people to StrongNode and make some money. The payout rate can be negotiated on a % or fixed amount basis, and we'll track your sales using exclusive coupons we give you access to. Contact us for further details if you're interested.

What am I allowed/not allowed to host on my VPS?
Please refer to our legal documents below:
http://strongnode.net/privacy.php
http://strongnode.net/tos.php

================================================
